Name: heart leiomyosarcoma
Definition: A colon cancer that arises from transformed cells of mesenchymal origin and is located_in the colon.

Name: heart fibrosarcoma
Definition: A B cell deficiency that is characterized by deficiency of an immunoglobulin subtype. The clinical course and prognosis is dependent upon the severity of the selective deficiency and associated morbidity.

Name: heart malignant hemangiopericytoma
Definition: A heart sarcoma that is a soft tissue sarcoma located in the heart.
